attributes.action: Provide essential workers with 'Hazard pay' during the COVID-19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: A large number of the UK is now in lock down to protect the country and the most vulnerable from the Coronavirus outbreak. While this is the right thing to do, Many of us are still providing essential services to help protect and care for the residents of this country and putting ourselves and loved ones at risk of contracting this virus. All I suggest is that those who are providing a critical role in the COVID-19 response be compensated with a hazard pay scheme for being on the front lines.
attributes.background: Introduce 'hazard pay' scheme for key workers who are putting themselves and their families at risk providing essential services in supporting the NHS, Government and the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
